lead_paragraph: Austin Rivers and father/coach Doc Rivers were ejected in the second quarter of the Los Angeles Clippers' loss to the Houston Rockets on Friday night.

headline.print_headline: Austin and Doc Rivers Ejected in Loss to Rockets
headline.main: Austin and Doc Rivers Ejected in Loss to Rockets
